thread.title: Armistead Maupin brings one-man show to Bay Area
thread.title_full: Armistead Maupin brings one-man show to Bay Area - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ryan Kost
title: Armistead Maupin brings one-man show to Bay Area
text:
Photo: Lacy Atkins, The Chronicle Tales of the City author Armistead Maupin talks about of his book being made as a musical, April 26, 2011, at his home in San Francisco.; Tales of the City author Armistead Maupin talks about of his book...
Armistead Maupin can’t quite bring himself to call his one-man show, “Logical Family,” a, well, “show.” Not just yet, anyway. Sunday, after all, is the first time he’ll be performing it on the West Coast, and even then, there’s a good chance it’ll be at least a little bit different from what he’s done in Provincetown, Mass., before. Tales of the City author Armistead Maupin talks about of his book being made as a musical, April 26, 2011, at his home in San Francisco.; Tales of the City author Armistead Maupin talks about of his book...
Armistead Maupin can’t quite bring himself to call his one-man show, “Logical Family,” a, well, “show.” Not just yet, anyway. Sunday, after all, is the first time he’ll be performing it on the West Coast, and even then, there’s a good chance it’ll be at least a little bit different from what he’s done in Provincetown, Mass., before.
